spas.taglib

Class Validation

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.TagSupport
      • spas.taglib.Validation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.IterationTag, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.JspTag, javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.Tag

    public class Validation
extends javax.servlet.jsp.tagext.TagSupport
    JSP custom tag for validating user's login. If successful does nothing, otherwise logs user out and sends user to front page.
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.2.1
    Author:
    Lauri Lavanti
    See Also:
    UserHandler, Serialized Form
